autoContrast.description: Determines whether icon color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有 filled 变体的图标颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color to set input background color in checked state, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: 将输入背景颜色设置为选中状态的 theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认为 theme.primaryColor

error.description: Error message displayed below the label
error.description_zh: 标签下方显示错误消息

icon.type: FC<{ indeterminate: boolean; className: string; }> | undefined
icon.description: Icon displayed when checkbox is in checked or indeterminate state
icon.description_zh: 复选框处于选中状态或不确定状态时显示的图标

iconColor.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color to set icon color, by default value depends on theme.autoContrast
iconColor.description_zh: key的 theme.colors 或任何有效的 CSS 颜色来设置图标颜色，默认值取决于 theme.autoContrast

id.description: Id used to connect input with the label. If not set, unique id is generated instead.
id.description_zh: 用于将 input 与标签连接的 ID。如果未设置，则改为生成唯一 ID。

indeterminate.description: Indeterminate state of the checkbox. If set, checked prop is ignored.
indeterminate.description_zh: 复选框的 Indeterminate 状态。如果设置，则忽略 checked prop。

label.description: Content of the label associated with the checkbox
label.description_zh: 与复选框关联的标签的内容

labelPosition.description: Position of the label relative to the input, 'right' by default
labelPosition.description_zh: 标签相对于输入的位置，默认为 'right'

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius

rootRef.description: Assigns ref of the root element

size.description: Controls size of the component, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制组件的大小，默认为 'sm'

wrapperProps.description: Props passed down to the root element
wrapperProps.description_zh: 向下传递到根元素的 props
